Optimization Issues: Unused CSS rules increasing file size
Multiple color variables defined but not consistently used
No CSS versioning for cache busting
Media queries not optimized for all device sizes
Inconsistent use of CSS variables vs. hardcoded values
Redundant CSS properties in multiple selectors
Accessibility Issues: Insufficient color contrast in multiple elements
Focus states not clearly defined for keyboard navigation
Font sizes defined in absolute units instead of relative units
Hover states without equivalent focus states

Performance Issues: jQuery used for simple DOM manipulations that could use native JavaScript
Spinner timeout set to 1ms which is too short to be effective
Multiple scroll event listeners without debouncing
No deferred loading for non-critical scripts
Animation libraries loaded but minimally used
Functionality Issues: No error handling for failed resource loading
Team page JavaScript relies on DOM structure without fallbacks
Counter animation lacks proper initialization checks
No form validation JavaScript for contact form

Accessibility: Missing proper ARIA landmarks throughout site
Insufficient color contrast in multiple sections
Missing alt text for many images
No skip-to-content link for screen readers
Form elements missing proper labels and ARIA attributes
No ARIA live regions for dynamic content
Performance: Unoptimized images increasing page load time
No resource hints (preconnect, preload) for critical assets
Unused JavaScript libraries loaded on all pages
SEO: Missing Open Graph and Twitter card meta tags for social sharing
Security: Email addresses exposed in plain text
No privacy policy or cookie consent mechanism
External scripts loaded without integrity checks
Content: Mixed language content (French/English) without proper language attributes
Inconsistent information across pages (addresses, contact details)
Placeholder or incomplete content in several sections
Inconsistent branding (Agecosco vs. GROUP AGECOSCO vs. Group Agecosco)
Mobile Responsiveness: Text becomes too small on mobile devices
Touch targets (buttons, links) too small on mobile
Content overflow issues on small screens
Navbar not optimized for mobile interaction
Images not properly sized for mobile devices
